title: The Cobbler
short_plot_summary: A lonely, third-generation New York City cobbler discovers a magical sewing machine that allows him to step into the shoes of his customers and experience their lives.
explanation: A man with facial hair, representing Max Simkin, the cobbler protagonist in the movie
A shoe, symbolizing the cobbler profession and the shoes Max repairs
A wrench, representing the magical sewing machine that plays a key role in the story
A potion bottle, alluding to the transformative magic the sewing machine grants Max
A cookie, representing the baked treats from Max's mom that show the importance of family in the movie
